exercises.name: doubleInteger
exercises.description:
Code as fast as you can! You need to double the integer and return it.
To test your code, click Go or hit Ctrl-Enter/⌘-Enter.

exercises.name: isNumberEven
exercises.description:
Little bit trickier now. The clock's started ticking again. Return true or false depending on whether the number is even.
You can use console.log() and alert(); the results will show up here.

exercises.name: getFileExtension
exercises.description: Here we go! Given a filename in a string (like 'test.jpg'), return the file extension (like 'jpg'), OR false if it doesn't have one.

exercises.name: longestString
exercises.description: Level 4 ! You'll get an array. Return the longest string inside it.

exercises.name: arraySum
exercises.description: Final challenge! Sum all the integers in a nested array, no matter how many levels deep.

exercises.name: isPrimeNumber
